text:
Are you quantitatively-minded and interested in social marketing (think Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram, and Linkedin advertising)? Brand Networks is hiring an "Associate Manager, Media Services" in San Francisco. -

http://www.indeed.com/cmp/Brand-Networks/jobs/Associate-Mana...

Please email dc@bn.co with your information and I'll help connect you to the right people here in the company. Thanks.
